Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Notaries will get msot of their pay from LABS chain iteslf.... The fungible chains wont really provide that much income... At least if they do, the chains will be extremly expensive to run...IU was not a fan of this method from the start because of it paying so much dust....

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Howver it is a very simple solution to the problem... Provided the theoretical attacks are too hard to carry out... OR able to be mitigated, or not possible.
